parseParameters(HashMap<String, String>, StringBuffer, StringBuffer) - Static method in class Generators.CNFReader
parses a HashMap with key-value pairs:
file: a comma separated list of pathnames
directory: a comma separated list of directories (all .cnf files in this directory are adressed)
regExpr: a regular expression: All files in the directories matching the expression are addressed

processEquivalence(int[]) - Method in class Coordinator.Processor
The method replaces all members of the equivalence class by their representative.
processLiteralRemoval(String, int) - Method in class Coordinator.Processor
This method removes a literal from a clause if one of the solvers has discovered that the literal can be removed
processLongerClause(Clause) - Method in class Coordinator.Processor
performs simplifications with new or shortened clauses:
- all subsumed clauses are removed
- all replacement resolutions (with the implicationDAG) are performed.
processOneLiteralClause(int) - Method in class Coordinator.Processor
computes the consequences of a new unit clause in the clauses and the implicationDAG.
Processor - Class in Coordinator
This is the superclass for PreProcessor, CentralProcessor and all Solver classes.
Processor(ProblemSupervisor, GlobalParameters, HashMap<String, Object>, BasicClauseList) - Constructor for class Coordinator.Processor
constructs a processor and initializes the common fields
processor - Variable in class Coordinator.Task
the processor which executes the task
processor - Variable in class Datastructures.Statistics.Statistic
The processor which generated the statistics
processPurity(int) - Method in class Coordinator.Processor
makes pure literals true and removes them from the clauses and the implicationDAG.
processTasks() - Method in class Coordinator.CentralProcessor
This method waits for new tasks and executes them until the execution returns a result (unsatisfiable or satisfiable) Tasks to be ignored are in fact ignored.
processTasks() - Method in class Coordinator.Processor
processes all task until a result is obtained or the queue becomes empty
processTwoLiteralClause(int, int) - Method in class Coordinator.Processor
simplifies all clauses with the new two-literal clause and inserts it into the implicationDAG
This may cause new unit clauses, binary clauses and other shortened causes to be generated and put into the task queue.
pureLiterals() - Method in class Datastructures.Clauses.ClauseList
returns all pure literals
pureLiterals() - Method in class Datastructures.Literals.LiteralIndex
returns all pure literals
